My Projects

Assembler

December 2019

For my 7th semester project, we implemented Assember logic in C. The whole codebase is built using a built tool - make. The assembler logic is written from scratch with a seperate Reader interface. Using a functional programming language we implemented both passes of an assembler and provided an assembler oriented solution to Spectre Attacks which involves Variable stalling.

Helping Hands

April 2019

An E-Mentoring platform which connects Students with Mentors. Key features of this platform include a Forum, personal Messaging, Authentication and Referral System. Technology used – Servlets, Java, Tomcat and MySQL.

Bachaao

March 2019

An Emergency Mobile App which broadcasts GPS Coordinates even in no-network areas, initiates emergency contact protocol in case of any accident and lets rescuers find you easily. Technology Used – Flutter.

Commander

February 2019

An Android App for Inter-Network, Cross-Platform, Real-Time controlling of a System’s CLI. Untraditional in its design, it uses a VM and Reverse SSH for Communication. Requirements – Java available on System. Through this app, I can run commands on my system (doesn't matter if it is on different network) and interact with my terminal.

EventBooker

November 2018

A web app which lets you book events. An individual can perform CRUD operations on an event, whereas an attendee can register themselves for the event. The frontend is build using React whereas the backend is built on nodejs powered by GraphQL.

Pantheon - Technical Festival

August 2018

The official website of our annual technical festival - Pantheon. Website was live on Digital Ocean for more than 180 days and catered to more than 1500 registrations. Lightweight and scalable website with CRUD operations, live notifications and dedicated admin panel for privileged action on Databse - MongoDB. It is solely based on client server logic where participants can register, are provided with dashboard panel, register onto various events and form teams for the competitions.
